org.elasticsearch.cluster.block
Class ClusterBlocks

java.lang.Object
  org.elasticsearch.cluster.block.ClusterBlocks

public class ClusterBlocks
extends Object

Represents current cluster level blocks to block dirty operations done against the cluster.
